metadata.title: CVE-2013-4419 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - low
metadata.description: The guestfish command in libguestfs 1.20.12, 1.22.7, and earlier, whenusing the --remote or --listen option, does not properly check theownership of /tmp/.guestfish-$UID/ when creating a temporary socket file inthis directory, which allows local users to write to the socket and executearbitrary commands by creating /tmp/.guestfish-$UID/ in advance.

criterions.comment: libguestfs package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
